name: BangorBuzz
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Bangor Buzz is an online community events calendar for Bangor Maine and surrounding areas. You can search thousands of events on our website that are going on today, next week or even next month. Use this Alexa skill in your flash briefing to get daily featured events and promotions. No additional hardware or requirements are needed for this skill. Don't miss out on all the fun that the Bangor area has to offer!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
